Package cat

Class Cat

java.lang.Object
cat.Cat
Direct Known Subclasses:
Lion
public abstract class Cat
extends Object
Abstract class Cat means you can't create an instance of this class, you can have an abstract reference to concrete subclass of Cat, such as Lion. An abstract method can only exist inside a abstract class, and we have one in this class clean() and any class the inherits from this class has to implement this method. To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
Author:
NoelF

Lion

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) abstract void clean()
    we want the lion to clean itself, so we have 3 options for this.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Cat

      public Cat()

  • Method Details

    • clean

      abstract void clean()
      we want the lion to clean itself, so we have 3 options for this. Option 1 not have a clean method in the abstract Cat class and have an independant clean method in the Lion class Option 2 have an abstract method clean in the Cat class, which would mean we would HAVE to have a clean() method in the Lion Option 3 have a concrete method in the Cat class i.e void clean(){ System.out.println("I am a Cat cleaning myself"); we choose option 2 }
